title: Bloomberg Markets: Baird's Lanser on Middle Market M&A

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Howard Lanser\u0010Managing Director of Mergers & Acquisitions Group\u0010Baird\u0010Discussing mergers and acquisitions activity and seeing "tons" of deals activity for middle market companies.
